duties_responsibilities.duty: Stock the shelves and maintain displays to represent Nabisco leading brands such as Oreo, Ritz, belVita, Chips Ahoy, Triscuit, and others.
Follow and communicate Sales Representative’s plans within stores and report any issues to the management team.
Execute the daily route plan prepared by the operations team to provide efficient in-store service.
Collaborate with sales representatives to optimize product visibility on shelves and construct promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Maintain a professional, positive, and upbeat attitude while representing Mondelēz in-store.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver's license and proof of auto insurance
